Full-stack Engineer

I build dedicated WooCommerce & Shopify e-commerce solutions. With a fast, scalable, and conversion-focused methodology. My focus is on building solutions that are not only functional but also optimized for performance and conversion.

I build e-commerce solutions that solve real business problems for small businesses and startups. With 4+ years of full-stack development experience, I specialize in transforming complex requirements into clean, scalable WordPress and Shopify solutions. What drives my work: Every project is a custom product built specifically for a client's needs—not just another task. I combine deep technical expertise with a research-first approach, ensuring solutions are functional, maintainable, and built to last. My technical foundation:

WordPress: Expert in action hooks, custom theme/plugin development, and WooCommerce ecosystems Shopify: Proficient in Liquid theming, app development (React + App Bridge), and complex third-party integrations Philosophy: Write functional, readable, scalable code first; optimize for performance second

What colleagues value: Punctuality, dedication, and a patient yet proactive communication style that turns unclear requirements into successful deliveries. Currently expanding into: React, TypeScript, system architecture, and AI optimization—always combining established technologies to strengthen my full-stack capabilities.
